                                      EULOGY PRESENTS
                                    TALES OF PHANTASIA
                                         FOR PSP


          PSP WARNING
      &#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~&#039;
       IF YOU ARE NOT EVEN RUNNING CUSTOM FIRMWARE ON YOUR PSP THIS IS NOT FOR YOU.
       Visit forums.qj.net for help if you want to mod your psp.  You&#039;ll need a
       friend with an already modded PSP or an old fat PSP still running 1.50               firmware.
 


           GAME INFO
      &#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~&#039;

          [LANGUAGE NOTES]

       This version of Tales of Phantasia for PlayStation was fan translated into
       english by Absolute Zero; however, that leaves all the voices in Japanese.
       If you&#039;re a true anime fan, this is the best way to have it!

       Also, upon starting the game, you can choose to have romanized or translated
       skill names.  For example, if you choose romanized you will see ability names
       such as Majinken, Guren, Kamaitachi, etc.  If you pick translated, you will
       see skill names such as Demonic Blade, Crimson Lotus, Whirlwind, etc.  When
       you select one it only lasts for that session; if you turn off your PSP or
       exit the game, you will be able to select again.

          [SIZE]

       380 MB - One disc


         GAME SYNOPSiS
      &#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~&#039;
       Tales of Phantasia begins by showing a heroic battle between four unknown
       warriors against an evil sorcerer, Dhaos, the outcome of which changed the fate
       of the world. The warriors were victorious, but Dhaos escaped through time.
       However, four different heroes are awaiting him: they seal the weakened Dhaos
       away using the power of two pendants, thus returning peace to the world.

       In the town of Totus ten years after Dhaos had been sealed away, where a young
       swordsman named Cress Albane and his best friend Chester Barklight live. The
       town is destroyed by a dark knight named Mars and his soldiers, while Cress and
       Chester are out hunting in the forest. Every villager is killed in the attack,
       including ChesterÃƒÆ’?s sister and both of CressÃƒÆ’?s parents. While Chester mourns,
       Cress vows for revenge. He decides he will head to the town of Euclid, as his
       mother asked of him before she passed away. The two friends decide they will
       meet up later, in Euclid.

         INSTALLATION
      &#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~&#039;
       1. Unrar with winrar.
       2. Copy the eboot.pbp & keys.bin to ms0:/PSP/GAME/Grandia using USB transfer.
       3. Run the game from the game/memorystick menu.
       4. ENJOY!


             Notes
      &#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~*&#039;*~.~&#039;
       Ripped and Converted by EULOGY
       Eboot graphics thrown together by EULOGY
       Eboot background original art by mooling89 (animepaper)
       Unofficial English translation by Absolute Zero


           REMEMBER
